content: knitted hat with cables in drops merino extra fine and drops kid-silk work from bottom up pattern me-249 yarn group b and a **size** s/m - l/xl head circumference approx 54/56 58/60 cm height with fold approx 25-26 cm **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-150 g colour 39 ice blue and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25-50 g colour 07 light sky blue needles drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops cable needle the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge ** 17 stitches in width and 22 row vertically in stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm
